name: Pop!_OS
description: Built for creators and developers by System76. Pop!_OS offers excellent workflow tools and GPU support out of the box.
longDescription: Pop!_OS is a Linux distribution developed by System76, a company that builds Linux computers. This gives them unique insights into hardware compatibility and user needs. Pop!_OS features a tiling window manager for improved productivity, excellent NVIDIA driver support, and a clean interface optimized for developers and creators. It's Ubuntu-based, so you get access to the vast Ubuntu software ecosystem.

seo.title: OmniSet for Pop!_OS | Developer Setup
seo.description: Configure Pop!_OS with OmniSet. Perfect for developers and creators who want a powerful, productive Linux environment with NVIDIA support.
